title: Re-add ML Enterprise logo assets and restore header/footer + favicon branding

requirements.text: Add the uploaded logo image (LOGO-2.jpeg) to the frontend as optimized static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, ensuring the files exist at the exact paths already referenced by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in the deployed build at these exact public paths: /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_128x128.png, /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png
The generated logo assets have a transparent background and appear as a crisp black wordmark on all standard displays

requirements.text: Ensure the site header and footer display the logo image using the existing references to /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png.
acceptanceCriteria: The logo is visible in the header (top-left) and footer brand block with no broken image icon
The logo image loads successfully (HTTP 200) from /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png in the deployed build

requirements.text: Ensure the favicon loads correctly using the existing references in frontend/index.html to /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png.
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab shows the favicon when loading the app
/assets/generated/ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png is present and returns HTTP 200 in the deployed build

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing site copy, navigation, or section structure beyond what is necessary to restore the logo display.
Adding new authentication providers or third-party integrations.
Changing the backend inquiry feature or data model.

required: Square black wordmark logo on transparent background (ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Square black wordmark logo on transparent background (ml-enterprise-logo.dim_128x128.png)
